==Preset for FFmpeg 13712==
[http://winff.googlecode.com/files/presets-r13712.zip Presets for FFmpeg revision 13712] are included here for upgrading. The 0.43 windows installer already comes with these presets. Debian and Ubuntu versions come with presets that work with the included ffmpeg. If you get a newer version you might want these.
